title: [BUG] Crash happens while "Next Search Result" command is applied on the empty search result.
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps To Reproduce
1.Open empty document (e.g. New 1)
2.Open Find dialog (ctrl+f)
3.Press "Find All in Current Document" button -> Search results with 0 hits
4.Open menu Search->Next Search Result

title: N++ crashes when sorting lines with numbers longer than 20 digits
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. create a file with 2 numbers on two lines, one with more than 20 digits
2. select both and use Edit -> Line operations -> Sort Lines as Integers Ascending
3. Notepad++ crashes
notes: the pop-up is different than An exception occurred tab

title: Sort lines on column crashes N++ if range includes lines shorter than selected col
steps_to_reproduce:
Description of the Issue
Notepad++ can sort lines using a selected column as the sorting "key". However, if some of the lines are short (have less length than the starting column number of the selection), a crash of N++ will result.

Steps to Reproduce the Issue
Create a new document tab and paste the following:
aaa

bbbbbb

cccccccc

abcabcabcabc
Lines that look empty above ARE truly empty (only contain their line-ending characters)

Make a column block with the start column in any column greater than col 1, for example:

Execute Edit (menu) -> Line Operations -> Sort Lines Lexicographically Ascending

title: UDL Styler Dialog crash
steps_to_reproduce:
Description of the Issue
When hitting enter after typing either the name or the size of a font in the Styler Dialog of the User Defined Language, Notepad++ crashes.

Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Language -> Define your language...
2. Styler
3. Type something in Name or Size and hit enter

title: Styler for user-defined highlighting crashes program when given arbitrary string
steps_to_reproduce:
Description of the Issue
When defining new highlighting rules for a custom language, opening the "Styler dialog" and providing an arbitrary string in the inputs for the font options will crash the program

Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Define a new language for highlighting keywords
2. Open the Styler dialog to edit text style
3. Instead of selecting a font name and font size from the combo-box, write directly an arbitrary string and press enter

title: [BUG] Inserting numbers with Column Editor causes crash
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps To Reproduce
1. Select at least 28 lines in Column Mode or multi-select at least 28 positions
2. Open Column Editor, select "Number to Insert", set "Increase by" to 9999999, "Repeat" to 1, and "Format" to "Hex"
3. Press "OK"

title: [BUG] Search Count can hang for a regex that matches null before a multi-byte utf-8 character
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps To Reproduce
1. Paste a└c into an empty Notepad++ tab.
2. Open the Find dialog, set Search Mode: Regular expression, and Find what: (?-i)\u*(?=[^\l]).
3. Click Count.
notes: Be aware of escaped \ in the regex string

title: NPP crash during column mode number insertion
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Open a new, empty document in NPP
2. Press and hold Alt+Shift and Right Arrow once to select the one character in the column
3. Go to Edit > Column Editor...
4. Select Number to Insert and fill in 1 for Initial Number, 1 for Increase By, 16 for Repeat, Check Leading Zeros
5. Click OK

5. Click OK

title: Notepad++ does not reset language styles when changing themes
steps_to_reproduce:
Description of the Issue
When switching themes, cancelling and then reopening the Style Configurator, the languages and their styles are mismatched.
If the new theme supports more languages than the old one, when selecting a language outside the range covered by the old one, if the language does not exist within the old theme, Notepad++ crashes.

Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Open the Style Configurator in Settings > Style Configurator
2. Select a theme that supports less languages than Default (stylers.xml), i.e. Obsidian
3. Save the theme
4. Reopen the Style Configurator
5. Change the theme from Obsidian to Default (stylers.xml)
6. Press Cancel
7. Reopen the Style Configurator again

Expected Behavior
The languages should reset back to Obsidian's.

Actual Behavior
The languages remained from Default (stylers.xml).
When selecting an item outside of the range covered by Obsidian that does not exist within that theme (for example Swift), Notepad++ crashes.

title: Delimiter selection crashes program
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Go to: Settings → Preferences... → Delimiter → Switch open and close characters to quotation mark (") and close the Preferences window.
2. Create new document (Ctrl + N), type something and press Enter to create a new line
3. While holding the Left Control key, double click your left mouse button on the empty line
4. Program should now close itself

title: Sorting by decimal numbers when there are empty lines in column selecting causes the program to EXPLODE
steps_to_reproduce:
Suppose you make a text, like this:

100/20  = 5

1/3     = 0.333

22/7    = 3.14285714286

Please note that empty lines between the numbers are intentional.

Now column-select the numbers to the right of the equals sign, then go to the menu bar -> Edit -> Line Operations -> Sort Lines as Decimals (dot) Ascending or Descending.

title: Sorting by decimal numbers when there are empty lines in column selecting causes the program to EXPLODE
steps_to_reproduce:
Suppose you make a text, like this:

100/20  = 5

1/3     = 0.333

22/7    = 3.14285714286

Please note that empty lines between the numbers are intentional.

Now column-select the numbers to the right of the equals sign, then go to the menu bar -> Edit -> Line Operations -> Sort Lines as Decimals (dot) Ascending or Descending.
notes: pop-up title: General Exception

title: A recorded macro with "Find Next" and then "Run until the end of file" crashes Notepad++
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps to Reproduce the Issue
Example file:
<mappingPart>
  <source column="v_0" />
  <destination observationCode="demin_leefstij1_0" />
</mappingPart>
<mappingPart>
  <source column="v_1" />
  <destination observationCode="demin_leefstij1_1" />
</mappingPart>
<mappingPart>
  <source column="v_2" />
  <destination observationCode="demin_leefstij1_2" />
</mappingPart>

1. Type the text pivotResultColumn="data" /> , select & copy/cut it so it's on the clipboard
2. Go to beginning of the example file
3. Go to menu Macro > Start recording
4. Ctrl+F to find next <source column="v" to move the cursor to next instance
5. Press End key to go to end of that line
6. Select last two characters />
7. Paste pivotResultColumn="data" />
8. Go to menu Macro > Stop recording
9. Now go to Macro > Run a Macro Multiple times
10. Select Run until the end of file and press OK.
notes: For some versions it takes while before the application freezes

title: User Defined Language crash issue on over 30 created UDL
steps_to_reproduce:
Description of the Issue
If user create User Defined Language over 30 times, app crash.

Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1.Click Create New button and input random name.
2.Repeat 28 times (because two preinstalled language exist)
3.Now create new language will crash app.

title: Crash in regex search
steps_to_reproduce:
Description of the Issue
Specific wrong regex [a-é cause Notepad++ to crash

Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Open search dialog and search for [a-é 
2. Enable Regular Expression search mode
3. Press Find Next

title: Bug in CustomFileDialog, when trying to close multiple of them, result in nullptr and crash
steps_to_reproduce:
Steps to Reproduce the Issue
1. Open Npp, create a new empty tab, write something in it to make it dirty.
2. In "Run a Macro Multiple Times" dialog, choose Trailing space and save, click the "run" btn multiple times.
3. Dismiss the Save-as dialogs.
